title: Umberto Eco: A Library of the World
occurrences: There is sad news that just arrived. Umberto Eco has died...
to celebrate the memory of Umberto Eco, the great master.
One of the biggest strokes of luck in my life was to have met Umberto Eco 35 years ago
Athanasius Kircher was probably the author Umberto Eco loved more, as a collector.
And in these books Umberto Eco literally lived and thrived.
Umberto Eco with his novel The Name of the Rose.
